data.title: Weekly Team Check-in

agendaItems.title: Project status updates
agendaItems.description: Marketing campaign is on track. Product feature development is delayed by 2 days. Engineering team completed the backend API ahead of schedule. Design team needs additional resources for the UI revamp.
agendaItems.decisions: Reallocate one designer from the mobile app project to help with the UI revamp.

agendaItems.title: Upcoming deadlines
agendaItems.description: Product launch scheduled for June 15. All teams need to finalize their contributions by June 1 for final review.
agendaItems.decisions: Each team lead will submit a detailed timeline by end of week.

agendaItems.title: Resource allocation
agendaItems.description: Engineering team requests additional server resources for the new deployment. Sales team needs updated marketing materials for the Q3 sales push.
agendaItems.decisions: IT will provision new servers by May 15. Marketing to prioritize sales materials for completion by May 20.

agendaItems.title: Any other business
agendaItems.description: Office move planned for July discussed briefly. More details to follow in dedicated meeting next week.
agendaItems.decisions: HR to send office move details and schedule follow-up meeting.

data.minutesMarkdown:
# Weekly Team Check-in Minutes

## Project Status Updates
- Marketing campaign is on track
- Product feature development delayed by 2 days
- Engineering team completed backend API ahead of schedule
- Design team needs additional resources for UI revamp

## Upcoming Deadlines
- Product launch scheduled for June 15
- All teams to finalize contributions by June 1

## Resource Allocation
- Engineering team requesting additional server resources
- Sales team needs updated marketing materials for Q3

## Any Other Business
- Office move planned for July
- More details to follow in dedicated meeting next week
